DOC.brief_summary: This research study examine usefulness group reduce stress help individual HIV stay healthy avoid problem associate sexually transmit disease . We hope discover whether group effective reduce stress-related symptom promote healthy behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Group Intervention Reduce Stress Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Must 18 year old , must HIVpositive , report engage behavior could put risk HIV transmission past three month , report experience one traumarelated symptom within past three month . Exclusion criterion include presence gross cognitive impairment , dementia , acute psychosis , severe physical impairment would preclude adequate comprehension assessment material participation small group intervention .
